ModMetaData.name: Real World Food 2-Fish Addon (Continued)

ModMetaData.description:
Update of Mikos mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1731635219
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wtwHAQu.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/RealWorldFood2FishAddon
--- Original Description --- Real World Food Fish Addon
Now catch the fish adding food, fish, and fish tank
Thank you for subscribe
This mode no longer requires 'RimCuisine 1.0' now use 'RimCuisine 2 Core' as the default
If you are an English user and want to change the description, there is a file inside that can be translated. If you think it is a good translation, please let me know so that everyone can use it.
